title: Install League of Legends on Linux using PlayOnLinux

embed.description: A video tutorial of installing LOL on Linux using PlayOnLinux. Original Tutorial: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflinux/comments/5ukgur/a_revised_guide_for_installing_league_of_legends/ LOL NA installer: http://web.archive.org/web/20151018130808/http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseNA.exe

body:
If you have problems with installing League of Legends on Linux, watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-int4LuRxRU
It really helped me with installing and i hope it will help you too.
This tutorial was made using this guide: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflinux/comments/5ukgur/a_revised_guide_for_installing_league_of_legends/

Good luck and GG.

replies.body: Always good to see players helping out players. Officially we don't support Linux, so it's really nice to see stuff like this trying to help others!
Uuuuhhhhhh side-note, I just noticed how awesome your name is XD!!!
